original_title: The Feds Told Him to Chase Aliens
overview: The (allegedly) true story of Paul Bennewitz. In 1980, Bennewitz began recording strange lights over Kirtland Air Force base. The story goes that when the Air Force caught wind of it, they encouraged him to believe that he was recording evidence of UFOs in order safeguard their top secret military projects.
tagline: The (allegedly) true story of Paul Bennewitz
title: The Feds Told Him to Chase Aliens
